oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Front and back covers of the Official Guide of 32nd Annual Encampment of the GAR
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The guide's complete title is "The Official Guide of the Citizens Committee in charge of the 32nd Annual Encampment, G.A.R., Cincinnati, Ohio, September 5th to 10th, 1898." The back cover has locations for the headquarters of state delegations at the; reunion. It belonged to Pvt. Michael Wyrick, Co. G, 68th Ohio Vol. Inf., USA.
